name: Mijassa2
description:
Hey,

this is my first  published game. It has taken two months to do this game. This game is a prototype. There are coming much more things. Requires a normal Pc/Mac.

Controls:   

-forward: W       -backwards: S     -left:A      - right:D    -run:Shift      -Inventory:Tab          -jump:Spacebar    -exit:Alt F4     -shooting:Left mouse button                 - aiming:Right mouse button  -reload:R

Sorry for my bad English. I hope you enjoy it and i will be happy about a review!
